short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily write and verify CSS and XPath selectors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate and verify CSS and XPath selectors

How to use:
★ Open Elements tab of Chrome DevTools
★ Open WebSync panel
★ Click on the element in Elements tab
★ Click on element attribute (tag, id, class, text, etc.) in WebSync panel
★ Copy generated selector

WebSync was designed to reduce the time spent on routine repetitive operations when generating and validating selectors.

See how this task was achieved in our WebSync Overview - https://medium.com/@wsbaser/websync-tutorial-why-is-it-better-then-others-b4f0a4b80577
